attributes.action: abolish prescription charges for anyone with an on-going medical condition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a sufferer of Crohn's Disease-a condtition that cannot be cured, and that requires long term medication. Anyone who has an on-going medical condition, who HAS to have regular prescriptions should not have to pay for them. It is unfair that people with certain on-going medical conditions do not have to pay (e.g Diabetics), and others do. If it's free for one on-going condition, it should be free for them all!
